布林博士给17号城市居民的寄语：
如果你觉得你的母星不好，你就去建设它，如果你觉得联合军不好，你就去消灭反抗军做国民护卫队，如果你觉得联合军掌管下的物种没素质，就从你开始做一个高素质的人类，如果你觉得联合军改造人士兵愚昧无知，就从你开始改造成精英改造人士兵，而不是在这喊什么“跟着弗里曼”。记住，你所站立的地方，正是你的母星！你怎么样，地球便怎么样！

Vamos a ver. El mejor puto juego de la historia, ni RV ni ostias. Ya no hacen juegos como estos, Valve dejo el listón demasiado alto como para que ahora me satisfaga ningún shooter :(
Este vacío solo puede llenarlo Half Life 3 ;)

Lets just hope we don't have to was another 16 years for more information about half life 3, will there even be a 3rd game? Or is Gabe just gonna skip to the 4th one? Who knows if will even be alive when we find out.

Half-Life 2;
The video game that introduced me to first person shooters.
The video game that introduced me to video games.
Half-Life 2 is a very, very good video game.
I could go on and on about what was revolutionized and what mechanics became mainstream because of this game, I could talk about the AI for hours, I could talk to you about the characters and level design, even the weapons, maybe drone on and on about it for hours, but I simply don't have the words capable of describing how good they all are.
It's best you play it yourself to understand, assuming you haven't played it yet.
You like physics? It's in here.
You like messing around with physics and throwing objects at enemies at velocities capable of killing them? Yep.
You like engaging combat and story? It's in here, too.
You like good level design? You got yourself a bingo on your hands.
This game is my favorite of all time for every possible reason in the book.
I've replayed it over and over since I got it back in (I believe) 2011, I was pretty late to the party, but I managed to go in completely blind, and loved every second of it, it's likely you will too, I mean, it's only ten dollars (at the time of writing), and despite its graphics and engine being outdated, it still holds up almost twenty years since its release.
Don't take my word for it, though.
Take your own word for it, and play the goddamn game already.
You've seen the reviews.
You've heard about it everywhere on and off the internet.
Just play it already, I promise its worth your time, and the $10 you'll spend on it.
So spend the money already, and wake up, Mister Freeman, wake up, and smell the ashes.

     From a Half-Life fan since 2011,
              ~Hiredgunman.
